website_summaries.verdict: Automobile owners who want to cover their tires on parked vehicles will appreciate this set's features and affordable price, despite a few minor concerns.
pros: Set of four covers that works for covering tires that are on vehicles
Protects against elements, as they sport a dual layer design that includes and exterior that reflects heat and sun
cons: Plastic hooks are difficult to attach
Sizes run on the small side, so you may have to order a size up

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Fits multiple tire sizes. Does not blow off when it gets windy. Offers great tire protection. Hopefully they will last longer than just one season. I've had them on for several months now and they are working great.
customer_reviews.author: Prineville Dave

customer_reviews.title: Required Item
customer_reviews.text: I knew I needed these. I rounded up the measurements and really should have rounded down. On the positive side, it's like clothing, a bigger size will fit but a too-small size would not have worked. I'm satisfied with my purchase. They arrive within the time listed in the ad.
customer_reviews.author: flyngrl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tire covers especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have used the expensive tire covers but will never go back. These are lite weight, reflect light aka heat, and fit snug on the tires with the elastic bands. For the price, I would rather replace these every year or two than have the heavy, dirt and grime absorbing expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Techn0

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be good quality for the cost
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be good quality for the cost. I had to request a replacement because the size recommended does NOT fit (too small). The company was VERY prompt in replying to my problem and sent out replacements immediately, so kudos for their responsiveness. However, I would recommend anyone ordering these to order THE NEXT BIGGEST SIZE to assure correct fit.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart and Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Be very careful what size you order. We are ...
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful what size you order. We are using them on our RV. We have 235/80 tires so thought they would fit but way to small. Wish the manufacturer would put some type of chart on the site so you know what size to buy. Ended up buying 40/42 Bus covers that fit.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Slaboch

customer_reviews.title: What's up with the secure hooks?
customer_reviews.text: They fit my 205 tires perfectly. The material is a bit thin BUT I wasn't expecting heavy-duty material for this price point. My only complaint is the (2) plastic hooks that come sewn on with the elastic. The elastic is too long for the hooks to connect to each other so I found no good location for the hooks to secure to. 4-stars for the product overall but 1-star as far as securing the product in place.
customer_reviews.author: WRP

customer_reviews.title: Save your money or keep looking!
customer_reviews.text: What a complete waste of money. I purchased the correct size for four RV tires. They are very inconvenient to strap on. you have to crawl behind the tires to strap them on. Even then, they never stay on. Wind over 30mph blows them off repeatedly. I have another set on a horse trailer. They are 12 years old and are still on. They are cracking from the sun and look horrible. But at least they stay on! These cheap things are worthless!
customer_reviews.author: Rick U

customer_reviews.title: Great covers
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 sets of these now. They go on very easily, the hooks are a bit of a pain to connect but they are unneeded unless there is a lot of wind and the tire is oriented the wrong way. I have one tire that will blow off, the rest stay on without hooks and we get a LOT of wind. Sun in our area is vicious and I have some more than a year with no ill effects. That is honestly 10 years worth of sun in some areas.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install but works well
customer_reviews.text: This is our second set of covers of this type. We had some for our travel trailer and we think they will last better than vinyl covered covers because those tend to crack - particularly in colder weather. However these covers are attached by two elastic straps with hooks. You need to reach all around the back and stretch one strap to the other side so you can hook them. This really requires that you lay under the RV. Now we have a motor home and the dual rear wheels present a difficulty. I made a tool to reach the strap but it is somewhat difficult. We plan to lengthen on strap and shorten the other.
customer_reviews.author: CDJukeBox

customer_reviews.title: Too large.
customer_reviews.text: 19-22" tire diameter? Fit way too large on a 21" tire.... Diameter of covers are 25" ????? I have been sent out replacements. They're the exact same too large covers. These are too baggy on my tires and do not fit! Manufacturer acts like they just blow it off and put the blame on Amazon. I'm returning both packages. I do not recommend Amfor. Garbage. Can't apparently measure and manufacture wheel cover dimensions if their lives depended on it. Get out of here.
customer_reviews.author: Spectre9298

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: These fit just fine. Material is thin and light weight, which is a positive, so far. I guess the elastic straps work for some applications, but what a pain it would be to connect both ends. Good thing they stay on without the straps. They could improve the product by making one strap long enough to throw to the other side. If I needed the strap, I would modify them.
customer_reviews.author: Artset Outset

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! (Updated)
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these on my truck wheels that are 24x12 on 33x12.5r24. They have been through several storms (one which was very severe) and they held up with no issues. The hooks come in handy once you find a place to hook them. However once you know where to hook, it takes only a few minutes to install all four. Also, the insides of the covers do not get dirty from the tires easily, and are easy to spray off or wipe off on the front sides and inside of covers. Definitely great quality for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Hanson

customer_reviews.title: They stay on
customer_reviews.text: I did like another reviewer and ordered one size larger, and they fit really well. Easy to put on and take off quickly. I think the little strap hooks were a nice thought, but I'll be darn if I can reach around the tire to use them. You'd need to be an orangutan or something but it doesn't matter, since they stay on even on windy days. I suppose you could set something behind the tire to attach hooks to if necessary. These are a great value. I only use them in summer to protect tires from sun
customer_reviews.author: Alvadog

customer_reviews.title: Great for Preserving Your Tires
customer_reviews.text: The silver coating keeps tires cooler in the Arizona sun and minimizes UV damage to the rubber. RV tires almost always need replacement due to rubber rot from UV, so this can help keep your tires good longer. The retention straps are hard to reach for shorter people, but even without the straps, it does cover the tires well.
customer_reviews.author: Dee NTop Contributor: Amazon Echo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It'll take some time before I'll be able to comment on the long-term durability of these covers. I needed covers for the tires on my boat trailer, to protect them from the Florida sun. The material is relatively fragile - so I don't believe they will stand up to frequent removal and reinstallation. I was also disappointed in the elastic straps, which were actually too long to provide the desired tension (I think I ended up just tying them together). But they did fit the tires as advertised and I think one can't expect much more than what they are for $30. That's less than $10 per wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rathert

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: Well I haven’t used them yet so I can’t review durability, but I hope they will last longer than the way they look. Kind of on the flimsy side. I’m not a big fan on the elastic straps behind the wheel for securing but I’ll amend my review after installing. On the plus side they do fold up into a small package.
customer_reviews.author: JBS

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than advertised size.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to put on the wheels of my duel axle travel trailer. My tires are 14" and the covers don't fully cover them. They are about 3" short. They should have been a little big. I pulled & tried to stretch them but ended up leaving them on as it's better than nothing while I find another set
customer_reviews.author: popsykle

customer_reviews.title: DON'T ORDER YOUR RIM SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: Measurer the diameter of you actual whole tire instead, from top to bottom! I ordered these for my camper which had 15" rims, so I got the 19-22" size thinking they would have plenty of room. They were WAY TOO SMALL. I reordered 2 sizes larger: the 27-29", and they fit fine. Tire diameter was 26.5".
customer_reviews.author: Roseclan

customer_reviews.title: I like the silver color
customer_reviews.text: I like the silver color. Fits the tire perfectly. Thinner material than the traditional white covers I had previously. Time will tell if the aluminum fabric will hold up better to the sunlight damage that cracked my previous white covers. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for 215/75-14 tires on my boat trailer and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for 215/75-14 tires on my boat trailer and they fit perfectly. The elastic on the back side seems to hold the cover on securely. There are hooks on the bottom that can be used to strap the covers to the tire, but I'm not sure I need them since the covers seem secure without them. Hopefully these will hold up to the Arizona sun.
customer_reviews.author: Wessel Family

customer_reviews.title: quality item
customer_reviews.text: Since I've only had them installed for about two weeks I can't really address the durability but they fit well (fairly snug on a 42" tire), they seem durable since they are an aluminized fabric over a soft cloth. my only real problem was the attaching strap hooks in the middle of the back of the tire which involves crawling under the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: R. Haley

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a year in direct sunlight
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our RV to protect the tires. We are in Florida, so sun protection is serious business. It hasn't been a year and I tried to adjust one the other day and it tore in my hand. Maybe Florida sun was too much for it and they would do better in a different climate, but we'll try another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: j perryman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up to Sunlight
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to protect the tires/wheels on a small trailer that I use occasionally. It sits in the backyard most of the time and I wanted to protect the tires from UV damage. Unfortunately the the silver fabric becomes brittle after a year of UV exposure and will tear easily.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C. Halbert

customer_reviews.title: Budget coverage for tires
customer_reviews.text: Purchased set for small 5x8 trailer storage. I use the trailer occasionally, and have it parked on stone pad in the corner yard. These covers attached easily to the frame with the elastic hooks, and provide full coverage for the tires. Durability has yet to be determined, but for the cost and I'm using just two at a time, this is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: A2theJackson

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 28" tire great!
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! I have only had mine for a couple weeks but they install easily & seem to be reasonably thick.These covers fit my 28" diameter tires great but I am not sure if they would go over a 29" tire. Like other reviewers, I got some 42" bungee cords to hold them on as the straps they have on them are hard to reach behind the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Gearhead

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and cover a little bit past the bottom of ...
customer_reviews.text: My tires are 26 inches across and I went with the 27-29. They fit great and cover a little bit past the bottom of the tire. Good quality and has held up in the winds, so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Brissey

customer_reviews.title: These fit very nice, the material is kind of light
customer_reviews.text: These fit very nice, the material is kind of light. I am covering tires on a car that will be left under an awning in the yuma, Az sun/temp. So time will tell about their durability for the next 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbi

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tire covers for my RV, which is parked outside the entire year. What I have noticed over the years is the sun puts more mileage on my tires than I do, the sides get sun rot in our dry NM climate and tires crack faster than tread is worn. These seem to be sun-proof, like sun block for you tires. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: John Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good tire savers
customer_reviews.text: These are great to save those expensive RV tires. The covers are kind of ugly, but for the price they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed
customer_reviews.text: I like these tire covers. They are well constructed, durable, and easy to put on the tire. I have had no problem with them blowing off (they have a little hook that secures them well). They have held up very well through a very hot and stormy Louisiana summer. Good purchase, I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Hafner

customer_reviews.title: Covers tires nicely
customer_reviews.text: I got these to cover my car hauler trailer tires, I'm tired of the Harbor Freight ones blowing away year after year, these have a hook system on the back, they haven't left me yet and it's been almost a year now! They fit well and cover tires completely!
customer_reviews.author: Lancelot

customer_reviews.title: Works great but kinda small
customer_reviews.text: These are supposed to fit 22r11.5 tires. They do, barely. It leaves about an inch of the tire exposed at the bottom but otherwise fits well. The elastic clasp is a little short as well. And forget trying to connect this clasp over dual tires.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Carner

customer_reviews.title: great covers, except....
customer_reviews.text: ...the bands that clasp together are shown in the product photos as short as to create tension. Mine came about a mile long each (see photo). All slack, and no tension at all to keep these from blowing away in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Fit like glove and are protecting the tires.
customer_reviews.text: Used these on what we call our "Dump Truck" an old Ford pickup we use around the property that sometimes sits for weeks at a time. These fit like a glove on LT 235/85R16 tires and have been keeping the weather and sun off of them for some time now.
customer_reviews.author: Jess H.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The tire covers seem to be durable. They go on easy enough but hard to figure out how to secure them, they have long elastic straps with hooks. Maybe I'm just not creative enough to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: jan m.

customer_reviews.title: A tiny bit loose, it seems
customer_reviews.text: They're generally awesome, especially for the price. But just a tad bit loose on my tires-- seems to be an issue with the elastic bands being too long, as the cover itself fits my tire perfect and snug. No regrets though!
customer_reviews.author: Ksears

customer_reviews.title: Do their job
customer_reviews.text: Camper van was 31” mud tires. These were easy to install and stay on very tight. Haven’t come off in wind and tires were still deep black after sun vs. fading to brown like they usually do when it’s stored in the sun at length without them
customer_reviews.author: Erich G.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Work great and easy to install. Haven't used the straps to attach as I don't feel like crawling on the ground to do it. The RV sits in a windy area, and the covers have remained on the tires even without those attachment straps. Look sharp and do the job.
customer_reviews.author: 505HandyGal

customer_reviews.title: Stayed on in several wind storms
customer_reviews.text: These fit my trailer tires perfect! I bought 2 sets and they stayed on both my trailers in over 50mph wind storm! They seem decent quality. I recommend these for sure. Oh and I do t use the hooks they come with, just slip on and go.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Tire protection at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: As described. They are light weight, fit my 27 inch tires perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JJR450

customer_reviews.title: They are cheap and break after two uses!
customer_reviews.text: After two uses the plastic hook broke and they are now worthless. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Ray Heiple

customer_reviews.title: These covers are true to size and amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: These covers are true to size and amazing for the price, especially since each tire and wheel cost me $1000.00. I have 22" rims and 38# tires and the Excessive Las Vegas heat really takes it toll on rubber here. Would definitely recommend these. Best price and quality in 50 states.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it fits 37 inch tall tires
customer_reviews.text: These wheel covers are great I live in Phoenix Arizona so the sunlight is brutal on tires since I don't drive my vehicle as often I was in the market for some tire covers it's hard to find any that fit 37 inch tall tires these ones fit like a charm and provide protection that I need I would like better material used but for the money these are definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Edgewater king

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, just check sizing
customer_reviews.text: These covers are very good quality for the price. However they run small. I had to return and then reorder two sizes larger for them to fit my motorhome tires. Judging from the other reviews this is a common occurrence. The covers are great for the price just watch the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Plunger314

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install (clever hooks on the back design)
customer_reviews.text: Work really well to protect tires from the sun. Easy to install, hold up well. This is my 2nd set, only because the 1st set is in storage in another city right now!
customer_reviews.author: Terry X

customer_reviews.title: Only last yr or two
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and ties are easy. Also reflective material. I was excited. But, they last 1 yr max in AZ sun. However, most do deteriorate and these are great for a year, maybe two max. I am ordering another set. Negative is out weighed by positive.
customer_reviews.author: Mberg

customer_reviews.title: Seem great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to protect our trailer tires from the hot sun and cold winters. They fit great and look good. I can’t attest to their durability yet but they seem like they will be okay for quite a few years
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley007

customer_reviews.title: Great while storing my rv
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to cover my rv tires while it's parked for the winter so far so good they have only been on a couple weeks so not sure how long they hold up but I'm sure they will be helpful while I'm not using my rv
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Poor Strap Design
customer_reviews.text: Just received so long term performance yet to be seen but material feels good quality. However, biggest disappointment is the straps on the back are WAY to big. The covers fit perfectly but 1 strap will stretch to the other side meaning these are twice as long as they should be with no ability to adjust .
customer_reviews.author: brent henke

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.  Good quality at a very fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Some other buyers are having problems with fit. As long as you MEASURE YOUR TIRE HEIGHT, these will fit fine. I totally love them. Easy to install, and they provide full coverage for my 4 31 inch trailer tires. I would buy again if I ever need to.
customer_reviews.author: Adam F.

customer_reviews.title: They don't fit as good as some say
customer_reviews.text: Where they hook on the back is toooooo loose so I hooked the hooks to the leaf springs.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Woomer

customer_reviews.title: They have been doing the job well!
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my class A motorhome with 22.5 rims. They are easy to put on and off and they stay on without a problem in fairly high winds. A great value!
customer_reviews.author: Musicman

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Fit a 10" Tire
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable... Description says fits 19"-22" tire. It barely fit over half my tire which is 19" and here I was worried it might be to "baggy" Complete waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits 39" off road tires great!
customer_reviews.text: These fit great on my 39" Humvee tires! These tires came from a trophy truck, so they should work excellent on those too! FYI Tires and Humvee not included.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Fit and cover well
customer_reviews.text: It fit around the tires and was perfect, protects around the sun. They give you some plastic hooks with elastic to tie them around the tires but the fit so well I didn't even use it. Make sure you get the ones for your tire size
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Good for 2.5 years in the sun
customer_reviews.text: If you live in a sunny environment, like AZ, these will last about 2.5 years...they do work well to keep the sun off the tires and rot them faster.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Nice value
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Haven't faced one of our very strong winds so am hopeful they will all be there afterwards. So far, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: TKay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, easy install
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and very easy to install. Looks to be of good quality and reckon they'll so just fine just wish they weren't made in China. Boo
customer_reviews.author: G.Teague

customer_reviews.title: No room but still works
customer_reviews.text: I love it the only thing that stops me from giving it 5 stars is that I can't reach around my wheels to clip it closed. I have 20 inch low profile tires, so there's not enough room for me to get under the car. Other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: RV Tire protection
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well made. Soft inside with durability on the outside. Only wish it was easier to install the hooks in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne A. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and off! We've had other brands and they worked well also. Price was the selling point.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Covers fit perfectly on 225/75/15 trailer tires. The quality is really hard to beat for the price. Very happy and I do recommend them. Delivery was much quicker that stated when order was placed.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS WATHAN

customer_reviews.title: covers well
customer_reviews.text: covers tire, if you can crawl under to strap to something. I installed snap buckles for ease to pop on and off.
customer_reviews.author: joe walsh

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!!  Does not fit 19.5 tire
customer_reviews.text: These were advertised to fit 27 to 29” tires, They did not fit 19.5 Motorhome tires. Complete waste of money.....
customer_reviews.author: Pilotdrl

customer_reviews.title: Needs some improvements
customer_reviews.text: The cover itself works? But because can be used in a range set of tires, it’s cant be adjusted to fit snug on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Wheel covers
customer_reviews.text: Work great easy to install, durable, this is my second set, the first one got sold with the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jarnot

customer_reviews.title: Good quality covers at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and of good quality. This was a good buy and I recommend it for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel G. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Nice at first, but didn't last more than a year
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these June 0f 2018, and they are flaking silver paint and falling apart. The pattern that is embossed on the fabric becomes weak over time, and the fabric falls apart. These barely lasted 1 year. Too bad, because I liked them a lot at first.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Lockett

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of construction and the fit on our RV. Easy on, easy off...fits snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a great product that I use to cover my cabins. These cabins will remain in parking until the end of october and during this period the maximum temperature will reach 50 ° C I will update during this period if the cover can survive during that period
customer_reviews.author: ADNAN K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on t8me in good packaging. Easy to install. Good protection from the sun in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla J.

customer_reviews.title: Crud-ola
customer_reviews.text: Revised... Had a storm... Had some light hail... Tire covers ripped... Find one that is better made with a thicker cover. These are fine for sun/rain, but anything else, buyer beware. Stinks...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hook straps are too long.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the tire covers are decent quality. They will perform the job appropriately although the straps are too long and stretch very easy. I taped the covers to the back of the tires and they seem to be holding well.
customer_reviews.author: JoshO

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT IS OK
customer_reviews.text: THEY WORK JUST FINE FOR BLOCKING THE SUN AND UV RAYS, BUT THEY ARE CUT SMALL . IT DESCRIBES THAT IT FITS 19' TIRE BUT MY TIRES ON MY TRAILER ARE 15" AND THEY ARE TOO SMALL....
customer_reviews.author: EdgarD

customer_reviews.title: Great for the hot Texas summer
customer_reviews.text: My 1 ton Ram had to be left outdoors this summer. Instead of using spray to protect the tiresfrom UV rays, I used these Amfor covers. They really worked well and kept my tires in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Friend from Fumee

customer_reviews.title: Great covers
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and good enclosure system for tires stored outside. It will be interesting to see if they last 4 seasons like the ones I replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Nevadaflyboy

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fit our 2017 chaparral 360ibl stock tires well. I thought at first it was too loose but we’ve had a few storms now and they’re going strong. They seem to have worked themselves out and not coming off
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great RV Tire Covers
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang on tires. Seem durable so far. Lighter than old thick PVC covers. Take up less storage space. Back hooks are worthless. Be sure you order right size!
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Works as described - good value
customer_reviews.text: Great little tire covers so far. Only been a couple months, so cannot say anything about durability yet. Fit tires well and elastic keeps them on - no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Pat Liloia

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for tires.
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and off. Mine have lasted for almost two years in extream Florida weather. Already ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Work well.
customer_reviews.text: Used these to cover 33x12.5x15 in tires. Fit great. Hopefully they last on the Texas heat.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ahead of schedule, fit G670 275-R70/ 22.5 very well. Plastic clip on elastic a bit difficult to work on Dually tires. Look good. Will see how they hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hofmann

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Use these for my horse trailer tires. They fit well and stay on good so far. Great value and decent quality!
customer_reviews.author: courtneyjune21

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, good price
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the tire covers long enough to give them a 5. They did arrive on time and were as advertised. Good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Bob

customer_reviews.title: Durable and secure
customer_reviews.text: These covers have withstood strong winds and the Arizona sunshine and held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a 17 inch tire. would not even fit the tire even though it was stated it fit up to a 22 inch tire
customer_reviews.author: Gunner

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These run True is size. I think some people just don’t know how to check tire size. I ordered one size larger and it’s too big. My bad. Could use better tying set up on the back.
customer_reviews.author: DrePDX

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, haven't had them on very long. We shall see after the winter. Seem to be of pretty good quality and easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: orrinh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and fit perfect on my toyhauler tires.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: great covers easy to use
customer_reviews.text: great covers easy to use. held up for close to a year on full sun all day every day.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Olstad

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to cover the tires
customer_reviews.text: These fit our boat trailer tires well. It was easy to cover the tires, but it is a bit hard to find a place to strap them to on the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Keeps sun off tires and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: These go on easily and seem to protect the tires. I don't know how they will hold up over time, but perhaps it won't be a problem. I hope so!
customer_reviews.author: JRae

customer_reviews.title: Will fly off if windy
customer_reviews.text: These are thin but for the price arent to bad. Easy to install on the tires.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, holds in wind events. They will cover solid rubber chocks, but not plastic Camco style chocks. For a non level site, you may need to put on the covers before you unhook and chock the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: chaznevada

customer_reviews.title: To short.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at the right size but it doesn’t go all the way to the bottom of the tire.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lebruno

customer_reviews.title: Still deciding if worth the money !
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy,and hard to reach around the tires when trying to put the covers on . I'll re-visit this review after 6 months and give an update !
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: These work as well as any you can buy, and are reasonably priced. Well worth the investment to keep the sun from rotting out the tires.
customer_reviews.author: le avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Covers fit snugly over tires
customer_reviews.text: These covers actually hold tightly to the tires they block the UV in the sun 100%
customer_reviews.author: D ale

customer_reviews.title: Lite and easy
customer_reviews.text: Lite and easy. The hooks in the back ( one or the other) latch to the spring or shackle. Hooking behind the tire would require our arms to be twice as long. Not possible.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off tires. Looks good also on car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: AmFor Set of 4 Tire Covers,Waterproof Aluminum Film Tire Sun Protectors, Fits 27" to 29" Tire Diameters, Weatherproof Tire Protectors
product_meta.description:
Size:27-29inches
Overview: 
This tire cover is made of waterproof aluminum material, thick cotton wool lining, durable. It is easy to install, remove and clean;no tools required. Folds up compact for easy storage. Fast and easy slip-on design. Hook design is not easy to be blown away by the wind ensures more secure fit. Protect the tires and wheels from sun damage, dirt,rust, corrosion and all types of weather when your vehicle is parked. Keep your tires free of scratches, in order to make your tires life more durable. Because tires left exposed to the sun and other environmental hazards will deteriorate much faster than you might think and could potentially lead to on-road blowouts as well as costly replacement. More serious may have security risks.
It has a wide scope of application. Ideal for use on RV, trailers, campers, cars , trucks and so on. Fits 27" to 29" tire diameters.

Specification: 
Material: Aluminum film material
Size: 27" to 29" tire diameters
Package Included: 4pcs

Note: 
Please allow 1-3CM differs due to manual measurement.
